title: Fantastic Four 01-50 + Ann 01-03 (1961-1966, Dgtl, TLK-E)
description: Stan Lee and Jack Kirby's tremendously creative partnership was best represented by their creation and initial run on the Fantastic Four. These four individuals were a decidedly new brand of hero, a true band of family and friends that were irrevocably altered by the fates (and of course, the ever-useful "cosmic rays" of science!). These first 50 issues and 3 annuals, presented in new digital rips, embody the best of the writing and art of the 1960's. Some of the classic stories contained in this torrent are: the team-up with Daredevil, "...And A Blind Man Shall Lead Them"; the introduction of the Inhumans; classic clashes with Doctor Doom among others and last but certainly not least, the famed "Galactus Trilogy" which closes out this collection - giving us Uatu the Watcher, the Silver Surfer and the unquenchable Galactus, Devourer of Worlds. The 3 annuals also have some amazing stories, such as one of the best battles with Doom and the wedding of Sue and Reed that degenerates into an all-out brawl with nearly every major superhero in Marvel's stable present and participating. Massive thanks to TLK-Empire for these pristine copies - PLEASE seed this one, as assembling this collection was a major pain due to the lapsed seeding of hitlists and the slow downloads of filelockers. I really hope you enjoy these, and Excelsior true believer! :-)
